channel.title: Shops 508
channel.description: Hello i have been trying to figure out how to make shops where you can sell items and stuff but everytime i ask for help no one replys i am using mezzy-scape 508 source and i need help with the shops i tried this tutorial jamishops.tk and it didnt give errors but when i click the shop i cant do anything like sell items, go to player stock etc and i went in my bulby.content and added shop.java and shophandler.java but i still cant fix it i desperately need help. :confused:

item.title: Shops 508
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

No sorry still didnt work i mean it opens the shops and everything but when i try and go to player stock it does nothing and ive tried everything the tutorials say.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops 508
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just adding the files does nothing. I personally have never used MezzyScape, but if you tutorial didn’t work I suggest loading a server backup and trying again. If it still doesn’t work, reply.

Read full topic
